lines.text: Abuse victims are always the best actors. They have to be, to live their whole lives with the pain and shame pretending there is nothing wrong. It's the greatest performance of all
Two thousand years ago we worshiped them
as gods. Three hundred years ago we burned them at the stake, as witches. Now we treat them with drugs... and therapy.
You're going to shoot me? How are you going to explain that?

[last lines, in his own voice]
You look ridiculous
